discourse_list.title: Suggested structure for each Working Group session

content.content: Please use this format so that each working group can find its mission and follow through on that mission. Initialize the work session  who champions this work? who can facilitate the discussion? (please review How) who can take notes? (please link to resources in a new thread on the Forum)  Describe what this group is focusing on Take action by answering 6 questions  who are the stakeholders? (be specific) what are the top concerns of the stakeholders? how do we coordinate action? how do we document? how do we prototype? what are the next actions?  Update the thread’s first post with the above information  add links to artifacts (Google Docs, HackMD pages, Telegram rooms, etc) the notes-taker can present this at the end-of-day
content.GPT-summary: The post suggests a structure for each working group session, outlining the mission, stakeholders, concerns, and next actions. The author explains how to coordinate action, document, and prototype, and encourages the notes-taker to present the information at the end of the day. The post may be of interest to those looking to organize working group sessions and collaborate on projects.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
